transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello India Mart customer care andi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: India India India Mart customer care.
Customer: No ma'am customer ma'am customer care pe call nahi kiya aapne aapne India Mart pe call kiya hai ma'am customer care ka number nahi hai. Main chat se bataungi aapko.
Customer: To customer care ka number nahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Nahi ma'am. Nahi ma'am.
Customer: Ha. To customer care ka number to mera mere ko ek problem hai India Mart se. Maine ek plan liya tha.
Executive: Ha ji.
Customer: Theek hai. Plan liya tha iske wo plan lene ke baad abhi char mahina ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Teen mahina ya char mahina ho gaya. Ek lead bhi nahi aaya. Okay mere paas okay ye wala hai ek kaun kaun email pe unhone bola tha ek lead per week 17 lead generate kar denge.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Genuine wala. Wo nahi wo nahi diya to pura amount refund karne karne ke liye bola tha.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Abhi teen mahina mein wait kiya. Ek lead bhi nahi aaya. Okay ek lead but ek lead bhi nahi aaya. Normal se lead bhi nahi aaya.
Executive: Achcha aapne aapne aapne naam kya bataya aapne company ka?
Customer: Prime Hardware.
Executive: Prime Hardware?
Customer: Ha dekho call karenge tumhare taraf se bolenge ma'am ye update karna hai wo update karna hai. Kitna din update karoge teen mahina char mahina kitna din lagega update karne ke liye. Main bol raha hu wo UPVC products ke liye karke aur theek hai uske baad fir se call aayega dusra wala se India Mart se hi. Ha wo nahi ye ye contact kar raha hai ye wala provide karenge wo wala bas utna hi hai. Dusra aur kuch nahi hai customer se to bilkul phone nahi aa raha. Okay.
Customer: To lead lead generate nahi ho raha lekin tumhare taraf se roz har roz panch che call aa raha.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main ek kam karta hu.
Customer: Kya matlab?
Executive: Ma'am ma'am aap bilkul nishchint rahiye main ek kam karta hu aaj to aaj office band hai theek hai na main aapko kal call karta hu main aapko pura aapka netting check karta hu theek hai aapka jo bhi issue hoga main aapko guarantee deta hu main kal aapko theek aapko theek kar dunga aapko theek hai aaj office band hai to kal aapko call karta hu main theek hai ma'am.
Customer: Okay yes sir kyunki na har din panch call India Mart se hi aa raha. Kya mujhe bataiye mujhe product ha ye product tum deal karenge kya. Main bol raha hu hum nahi deal karenge UPVC ki related hi hum log deal karenge. Main ye baat 100 baar bol chuka hu lekin fir se ek din ho gaya dusra din fir se call karenge ye wala product ke liye enquiry kar raha tumhare paas hai kya. Kya matlab hai puchne ke liye main har baar bol chuka hu theek hai hum log UPVC hardware mein hi deal karenge karke to wo 20 products se jyada hi nahi hai. To kya lead to nahi generate kar raha lekin har din panch che baar call kar raha wo update nahi ho raha isliye hum log call lead nahi generate ho raha. Fir teen mahina kitna time lenge ek lead generate karne ke liye.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main samajh gaya aapki problem main aapko mujhe bataiye main aapko kal call karu taki aapko jyada dikkate na aaye aap mujhe us time call uthane mein dikkate aayegi main us time call karu.
Customer: Aaj aaj hi call kar do aaj hi call kar do.
Executive: Nahi nahi issue hai na ma'am aaj office band hai aaj ek jayanti to office band hai to kal office chalega.
Customer: Ha to kal 10 baje ke upar kar do.
Executive: 11 baje karu main aapko call main?
Customer: Ha ha theek hai kisi bhi time pe kisi bhi time pe kar do lekin ye ye baat settle hone hona chahiye is.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul ma'am bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Ha kyunki it's like a you know we had pay the payment and you know daily wo call karega wo ye product hum log sell karte kya kya lead to nahi aa raha lekin India Mart se call aa raha ye product sell karna ye product sell karenge kya aisa puchne ke isme matlab hi nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai main ispe dekhta hu theek hai main aapko kal call karta hu theek hai ma'am.
Customer: Ha theek hai theek hai thank you so much sir thank you so much.
Executive: Okay okay okay ma'am okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads generated after 3-4 months.

- Wants refund as promised for no leads.

- Receives multiple calls daily for irrelevant products.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Will check the netting and call back tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, upvc products, irrelevant calls
